welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Leigh, a charming coastal town known for its stunning beaches and vibrant seaside atmosphere. We are delighted to have you here and invite you to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and lounges for passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines for European and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves seasonal flights to popular holiday destinations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi for up to 2 hours throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A private terminal for VIP and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi available throughout the airport.
